recipeData.name: Avocado Egg Sandwich
instructions: Lightly toast the bread until golden and crisp.
Prepare the avocado by cutting it in half, removing the pit, and scooping the flesh into a bowl. Mash with a fork and season with salt and pepper.
Assemble the sandwich with the mashed avocado and fresh thyme.

recipeData.name: Pumpkin Soup
recipeData.uses: Pumpkin, Onion, Garlic, Carrot, Chicken Stock, Salt, Pepper
instructions: In a large pot, sauté the onion and garlic until fragrant.
Add the pumpkin, carrots, and chicken stock. Cook until the vegetables are tender.
Blend the soup until smooth and serve hot.

recipeData.name: Salmon Rice Bowl
recipeData.uses: Salmon, Rice, Vegetables, Olive oil, Salt, Pepper
instructions: In a large pot, sauté the onion and garlic until fragrant.
Add the pumpkin, carrots, and chicken stock. Cook until the vegetables are tender.
Blend the soup until smooth and serve hot.
